metadata.title: Tuesday, 7th March, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that there is an artificial shortage of mealie meal in Northern, Muchinga and Luapula Provinces, because trucks delivering mealie meal to the respective provinces are not being allowed to go beyond the Nkumbi Police Check Point on the Great North Road;
(b) if so, why the trucks are not being allowed to cross the Check Point; and
(c) what urgent measures are being taken to resolve the problem that has caused the escalation of mealie meal prices in the said provinces.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that there has been a critical shortage of water, in the past two weeks, in the following areas in Nakonde Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Mukoma; (ii) Katozi; (iii) Old Nakonde; and (iv) Town Centre;and
(b) if so, what urgent measures are being taken to resolve the water crisis and prevent water borne diseases.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a health centre at Mutapa Village in Chifunabuli Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
